SEARCH
Package de.cxp.ocs.elasticsearch.model.term

Class ConceptTerm

java.lang.Object
de.cxp.ocs.elasticsearch.model.term.ConceptTerm
All Implemented Interfaces:
QueryStringTerm
public class ConceptTerm extends Object implements QueryStringTerm
A concept that consists of several tokens that have a specific meaning in their context. The separate tokens/terms/words should not be used separately.

Useful for languages that name things using several words, i.e. "iron flat"(en), "fer Ã  repasser"(fr), "plancha de ropa"(es)

Author:
Rudolf Batt
